#summary Getting a binary installation working on windows
#labels Tutorial

= Pre-requisites =

= Extract archive =

Put it somewhere without a space in the name, i.e. `c:/`

The rest of this will assume that the installation is in `c:/RDKit_Q22009_1`


= Environment variables =
 * `RDBASE`: `c:/RDKit_Q22009_1`
 * `PYTHONPATH`: `%RDBASE%` if there is already a PYTHONPATH, put `;%RDBASE` at the end.
 * `PATH`: put `;%RDBASE%/bin`
